com.harambe.gui

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.harambe.gui.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledScreen, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ControlledScreen
    Controller of the main game. Contains mostly the chip dropping and logic behind the visual representation of the board.

      • fireDisabledButton

        private void fireDisabledButton(int column)

        Parameters:

      • fireButton

        Parameters:

      • checkForWin

        private void checkForWin()
        checks for a potential winner. Ends the set and shows how he/she won. Decides to end the set or the game.
